attributes.action: Make all Lottery charity money go to the needy!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop giving lottery cash to Museums etc Which everday ppl don't bother with and put all the money into our inner city council estates. Funding projects for the council estate kids ie Football pitches, liesure centers and other projects to keep them off the streets and making peoples lives a misery!
